content: this blanket is sure to pop perfect for any nursery the colorful polka dot baby blanket is an easy pattern where you get to practice bobbles color changes simple stitches such as double_crochet as well as the herringbone half_double_crochet stitch work it up in bernat softee baby yarn an easy-care light worsted weight yarn this yarn comes in a variety of colors to chose from plus it is oeko-tex certified making it extra safe for baby projects
